file_content.text: Father's looking for you.
Outlander. I should have known Father would bring you here.
When I kill you, I'm sending your head to Vaylin as a reminder of what's coming.
I'll enjoy destroying you.
You invaded my empire, killed my mother... I will have revenge.
Outlander. It appears we both saw the opportunity to confront my sister.
We should have been working together. I helped Senya because I saw that potential.
Join me, Arcann.
Do we really want to ally with a former tyrant?
I stand corrected.
Traitors to the throne, prepare to fall!
If Vaylin wants to challenge us, we'll meet her together.
Let's show the empress who she's dealing with.
We do this as a team.
Understood.
Father wants a word with you.
This is between you and me. Valkorion has nothing to do with it.
Valkorion has no part in this.
Vaylin was mine. She'd be dead if you hadn't stormed in and ruined everything.
You wrecked my plans.
Follow my lead, or stay out of my way.
You better be useful.
Consider this your audition for the Alliance.
Show me what you can do.
I stand with you, Outlander.
I'll be sure to leave a good impression.
I save your life, and this is how you reward me. Vaylin would be dead if you hadn't barged in and derailed the plan.
This is your fault.
Arcann's been working against you since the beginning. He'll never change.
He hasn't exactly proven himself.
My mother... Where is she?
Healing on Odessen. I can take you to her.
It was a mistake. I admit that.
I hardly recognize you without the mask. The new look suits you.
You've really changed.
It marks a new beginning.
Even if he's changed, can we really trust him?
My sister doesn't shock that easily.
I'll deal with my sister after I destroy you.
Even now Father manipulates you.
